creditline: Gift of Dr. Gabriel P. and Yvonne M.L. Weisberg in honor of Elizabeth K. Mix (Menon)
description: three loosely drawn figures- left figure is partially complete, with torso, part of head, arms and top of legs drawn; center figure is in profile, facing right, wearing a head dress, with long flowing veil and medium length, loopy skirt; right figure wearing a harlequin costume, holding a raised rod in PR hand
provenance: [Arsène Bonafous-Murat, Paris, until about 1994; sold to Mix]; Elizabeth Mix, Indianapolis (given to Weisbergs); Yvonne and Gabriel Weisberg, Minneapolis (until 2018; given to Mia)
title: Three Figures
